Attacks.Name: Fire Spin
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Eruption
Attacks.Effect: Deals damage to all characters within range 2 of the target. A wild roll increases the damage by 1 for each character.

Attacks.Name: Sacred Fire
Attacks.Effect: This attack has a chance to Burn multiple targets within its range if a wild is rolled.

Superpowers.Name: Roar of the Volcano
Superpowers.Effect: Push all enemy characters within range 2 away M distance and apply the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Flame Charge
Superpowers.Effect: Increase Entei's movement to S for its next activation. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Lava Plume
Attacks.Effect: This attack creates a plume of lava around the target, dealing damage to all characters within range 1 of the target. A wild roll applies the Burn condition to those characters.

Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: A focused stream of fire that can target an enemy character. If a wild is rolled, in addition to the Burn condition, reduce the target's movement by S for their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Volcanic Wrath
Superpowers.Effect: Gain +2 Strength for all attacks this turn. Each attack deals 1 automatic damage to all enemy characters within range 1 of the target.
